metadata.title: CVE-2024-26735 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: sr: fix possible use-after-free and null-ptr-derefThe pernet operations structure for the subsystem must be registeredbefore registering the generic netlink family.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
